detaileddescription.para: iic 0 slave address working in slave mode
iic 1 slave address working in slave mode
iic 2 slave address working in slave mode
get an iic device by iic device id.

simplesect.para: MUST be called during system init

detaileddescription.para: Realize the HSDK board iic object using designware iic device driver, only need to realize some designware iic structures combine with HSDK iic hardware resource. just like cpp class instantiation.
